channel.title: [RSPS] 317 UltimateX PK Server! NO LAG 24/7 Awesome Combat System!
channel.description:
Website home page:[url=http://corruptspecz.info/]http://corruptspecz.info/[/url]
Webclient: [url=http://corruptspecz.info/webclient.html]http://corruptspecz.info/webclient.html[/url] DL Client: [url=http://corruptspecz.info/client/UltimateX.jar]http://corruptspecz.info/client/UltimateX.jar[/url]
Forums: [url=http://www.corruptspecz.info/forums/index.php]http://www.corruptspecz.info/forums/index.php[/url]
Features: -PVP -Pk points -Multiple places to pk.-Edge -Varrock -West & East Dragons -24/7 100% Uptime -No Lag -Vesta items and weps and more! -Korasi-100% fully functioning
Also there is: -Active Community -Fully working clan chat -Yell -Commands ::master ::pure -Shop Rewards -Fully working combat system -Dragon Defender -Veng and spellbook
PICS: [img]http://i.minus.com/iiv9wkjxvAheb.png[/img] [img]http://i.minus.com/izOYDIdd1076a.png[/img] [img]http://i.minus.com/irZht0nF17fAf.png[/img] [img]http://i.minus.com/iBKDqjWYUX3qH.png[/img] [img]http://i.minus.com/ibtGIEpvPmmgl5.png[/img]

item.title: [RSPS] 317 UltimateX PK Server! NO LAG 24/7 Awesome Combat System!
item.dc:creator: @Corrupt_Claw Corrupt Claw
item.description:
@Corrupt_Claw wrote:

Hmm i think i can name my character what ever i want am i not correct? Im guessing most of you dont know shit. First of all its still being updated 2nd i did change more than you think. Im guessing no one thinks about core issues which isnt visible unless you know some secret i dont. This source has a huge amount of problems. I fixed some still working on alot more. The combat system for one was fucked. The walking was laggy. Bonuses where fucked. donor points where not fully coded in, yell was fucked, donators had no powers and much more who ever said i didnt even touch combatassistant.java which couldnt even take the time to name the file “the file that deals with combat” <-- wtf does that mean? If you didnt know it came out 2 days ago yes i turned it on then started coding so the fuck what. Go trash someone elses thread and if you have a problem keep it the fuck moving and go code your own server let me know how that works out and if you wanna talk about leech them every damn server out is leached you do have to start with a base if im not mistaken. O ok kk Thanks Get of my ##$%. Bye guys. Come at me.

Read full topic
